protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for thyrothropin. Plays a central role in controlling thyroid cell metabolism. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate adenylate cyclase. Also acts as a receptor for thyrostimulin (GPA2+GPB5)

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
